name: "Sly 2" - "Menace in the North, Eh?" (PS2) Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: What do you get from the vault in this level?
questions.explanation:
Lightning Spin.

	The vault is in the room with the laser you use to melt ice to get a book.  If you drop down to where the moose are, and where Murray had sneaked in to find out where the battery was hidden by playing with an RC car, you can get to the vault.  The vault is in the far right corner of this room.

questions.text: What is the prize if you win the Lumberjack Games?
questions.explanation:
Clockwerk talons.

	You hear Jean Bison mention the prize first when you are listening in to Jean Bison's conversation.  You can hear Jean Bison mumbling about the prize.

questions.text: What must you place in the snow to redirect the laser?
questions.explanation:
Crystals.

	When you place a crystal at the end of a laser, it bounces the laser until you finally get to some ice.  Inside the ice is a mammoth and a log chopping book.  Once you melt the ice, the mammoth runs off into the icy water, and refreezes.  You also get the book and bring it back to the safehouse.  But be careful when placing the crystals!  You CAN get hurt by these lasers if you are not careful!

questions.text: What is the animal that is trapped in the ice?
questions.explanation:
Mammoth.

	The mammoth is trapped in the ice, and you unfreeze him while you try to get the log chopping book.  Bentley describes him as a "creature so majestive, with a strong desire to live" but stops because he falls in the water and freezes again.

questions.text: What kind of animal must you take an egg from?
questions.explanation:
Giant Canadian Eagle.

	When Murray destroys all the oil pumps using the bear, the oil vents catch fire.  This causes a lot of pressure, and Sly can use his paraglide to soar very high.  He then glides all the way over to the nest and steals the egg.  The egg is used to cheat in the Lumberjack Games.

Old Grizzle Face.

	You first find out what his name is during one of Murray's missions.  Murray must use Old Grizzle Face to destroy the oil pumps so Sly can steal an eagle egg.

questions.text: How many vents does Sly use with his paraglide?
questions.explanation:
Five.

	There are a total of five heat vents, each getting higher and higher into the sky.  Sly uses these so he can paraglide all the way to the eagle's nest to steal an egg.

questions.text: What event does Murray partake in?
questions.explanation:
Power Log Chopping.

	There are two parts to this.  First, you must chop the wood down in as little chops as you can.  Then, Bentley works his way to Jean Bison to plant the eagle egg in the pocket so he would lose.

questions.text: What event does Bentley partake in?
questions.explanation:
Log Rolling.

	Bentley competes in the log rolling competition since he is good at math.  He figured out a formula to win the competition, which is "log=r/psec."  When you are through with the log rolling, you use Sly to get the judges away so you can take their place, and get Jean Bison to lose.  Before Bentley begins, Jean Bison calls him "Candy Britches."

questions.text: What event does Sly partake in?
questions.explanation:
Power rock climbing.

	You must first climb a wall with Sly in the fastest time possible.  But you must be careful not to hit the zappy hooks!  When you finish, you must use Murray to get Jean Bison off the wall.  You use grappling hooks, and once all three are attached to Jean Bison, he is yanked down.
